basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: NodeJS Developer
basics.summary: A proficient NodeJS Developer with over 2 years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining server-side applications using JavaScript and its asynchronous programming model. Skilled in building scalable RESTful APIs with Express.js and integrating with MongoDB databases, while collaborating with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements. Bachelor's degree in Informatics, with strong problem-solving skills, knowledge of Git for version control, and a passion for staying updated with emerging technologies.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Developed server-side applications and collaborated with cross-functional teams on full-stack projects, including AI integrations using Node.js and Express.js.
highlights: Contributed to backend development with Node.js and Express.js for AI-powered solutions, ensuring clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Collaborated with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic in exam management platforms
Participated in code reviews and troubleshot technical issues to optimize performance, utilizing Git for version control
Developed RESTful APIs and worked with MongoDB for data management in projects like RoboGPT and AdCognition

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Architected and developed server-side components for a full-stack retargeting platform using Node.js, collaborating with front-end teams on integration.
highlights: Developed high-quality server-side applications using Node.js and TypeScript, participating in design and architecture of scalable features
Integrated user-facing elements with server-side logic for dashboard and campaign management components
Troubleshot and debugged applications to ensure optimal performance and cross-browser compatibility
Contributed to team knowledge sharing through code reviews and system design discussions

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Developed JavaScript-based automation tools to improve efficiency, demonstrating problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
highlights: Developed Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software for automating form-filling and email generation, winning 1st place in innovation contest
Applied asynchronous JavaScript programming to create efficient automation solutions
Honed communication and teamwork skills while troubleshooting technical issues for diverse customer needs

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based automation tool that streamlined server-side tasks and improved efficiency

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application
projects.description: Full-stack social media application developed using MERN stack, focusing on server-side logic with Node.js and Express.js for RESTful APIs.
highlights: Developed server-side applications using Node.js and Express.js to handle asynchronous operations and integrate with MongoDB
Collaborated on design and architecture, building scalable features with clean, maintainable code
Implemented RESTful APIs for user-facing elements, ensuring optimal performance through troubleshooting and debugging

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: AI-powered browser extension using TypeScript and TensorFlow.js, with backend integrations for real-time processing.

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: Extension for Nvidia Isaac Sim using OpenAI APIs, involving server-side logic for natural language processing.
